name: Tetra Technologies, Inc.
description: Tetra Technologies, Inc. is a leading provider of water management and logistics services, primarily serving the oil and gas industry. Founded in 1999 and headquartered in The Woodlands, Texas, Tetra offers a comprehensive range of solutions designed to optimize water use and minimize environmental impact. The company specializes in high-quality water treatment, recycling, and sourcing, as well as the delivery of water for hydraulic fracturing operations. Tetra's innovative technologies and services help clients improve operational efficiency while adhering to stringent regulatory standards. Furthermore, Tetra is committed to sustainability, focusing on reducing the water footprint of energy production through advanced water management practices. The company also provides a variety of complementary services, including environmental consulting and project management, enhancing its value proposition to clients. With a strong emphasis on safety and environmental stewardship, Tetra Technologies aims to support the evolving needs of the energy sector while promoting responsible resource management.
